description: There’s no greater “daddy presence” among the Lucas Men of Lucas Entertainment than Tomas Brand, the forever-reigning King of All Muscle Daddies. Tomas shares his sexual experience with the younger Andrey Vic, the sexy and masculine Ukranian versatile top who already has quite a bit of experience commanding submissive young guys. But there’s a new bottom on the set, Robert Law, and he’s begging to get his hole slammed. It’s time for Tomas Brand and Andrey Vic to team up and teach Robert Law who is in charge from the jump.
title: Tomas Brand And Andrey Vic Slam Robert Law
